video.title: Jack Taylor
video.synopsis: Ken Bruen's bestselling crime novels leap to life in this series of TV movies featuring Irish cop-turned-private-investigator Jack Taylor.

episodes.synopsis: Investigating a girl's apparent suicide, Jack uncovers a sinister conspiracy that threatens one of his closest friends.
episodes.title: The Guards

episodes.synopsis: Jack's new sobriety is sorely tested when he gets entangled with the Pikemen, a group of old-school vigilantes, and finds himself suspected of murder.
episodes.title: The Pikemen

episodes.synopsis: While trying to track down a notoriously abusive nun, Jack stumbles into a murder plot and raises the ire of a powerful local thug.
episodes.title: The Magdalen Martyrs

episodes.synopsis: Still working to stay clean and sober, Jack suspects that two students' deaths are the calling card of a cunning serial killer.
episodes.title: The Dramatist

episodes.synopsis: Pushed to the brink by his own demons and the brutal slaying of a local priest, Jack drifts into a shadowy world of conspiracies, terror and murder.
episodes.title: The Priest

episodes.synopsis: When 11-year-old traveler Rosie witnesses her mother's murder, she suppresses the memory. Jack attempts to unlock the secrets of Rosie's damaged mind.
episodes.title: Shot Down
